alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Caldwell, southeastern Guadalupe, north central Karnes, Gonzales and northeastern Wilson Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 1000 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nixon, or 15 miles northeast of Stockdale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Luling, Nixon, Smiley, Pandora, Gillett, Palmeto State Park, Brownsboro, Leesville, Oak Forest, Belmont, Nickle, Wrightsboro, McNeil, Cost, Dilworth, Little New York, Thompsonville, Ottine, and Bebe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
